actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management took the following actions.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.
Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Taxation and Debt Management

official_title: A bill to provide a credit against Federal income tax for expenses involved in the planting of pecan trees to replace pecan trees destroyed by Hurricane Frederick.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an income tax credit for expenses involved in the planting of pecan trees to replace those destroyed by Hurricane Frederick.

titles.title: A bill to provide a credit against Federal income tax for expenses involved in the planting of pecan trees to replace pecan trees destroyed by Hurricane Frederick.
